content: Hi all, I wanted to check if the IG Publisher Web Server (http://hapi.fhir.org/igweb) can still be used to generate IG output files. I got this error "hapi.fhir.org is currently unable to handle this request" when I tried using it. Thanks!
Hi @Aishwarya Ravindran , what were you doing when you got this error? I just tried it and it worked for me.

@James Agnew : I just selected the IG zip file for which I needed the output and hit "convert". It assigned a job number and then failed with the server error. Screen-Shot-2018-03-07-at-5.20.47-PM.png

I am starting to dip my toe in the FSH pool and working through the tutorials over at FSH School. They link to https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/IG+Publisher+Documentation#IGPublisherDocumentation-UsingFHIRIGPublisher with details about the FHIR IG Publisher. That page does mention using the IG Publisher Web Server but the link in that section (to http://hapi.fhir.org/igweb) gives me a 502 Bad Gateway error. I tried it on Chrome and Edge, and on another computer.

Is there a current issue with the Web Server ?
there isn't one. I should remove that reference

ok then. I guess I have to install the IG Publisher and Jekyll.
Thanks Grahame.
